Constructor Detail

MIDIClient

public MIDIClient(CAFString name,
                  MIDINotifyProc notifyProc)
           throws CAException
Create a new MIDIClient. The application should maintain a reference to this object for as long as it is using the ports and endpoints attached to this client.

CoreAudio::MIDIClientCreate()

Parameters:
name - The name of the client to be created
notifyProc - An optional MIDINotifyProc to receive notifications of changes to the system.
Method Detail

inputPortCreate

public MIDIInputPort inputPortCreate(CAFString name,
                                     MIDIReadProc readProc)
                              throws CAException
Create an input MIDIPort through which incoming MIDI messages are received from any MIDI source Use port.connectSource() to establish an input connection from any number of sources to your port

CoreAudio::MIDIInputPortCreate()

Parameters:
name - The name of the port to be created
readProc - The read proc to be called with incoming MIDI from sources connected to this port
Returns:
A newly created input MIDIPort
Throws:
On - error within MIDIInputPortCreate
CAException

CoreAudio::MIDIDestinationCreate()
